tweet:
The days of empty "thoughts and prayers" in response to #gunviolence are over. 

@HouseDemocrats are committed to passing tougher gun laws that will keep Americans safe. https://twitter.com/RepJerryNadler/status/1101188737080401920 …

For President Trump to side with Kim about the murder of Otto Warmbier is outrageous and builds on the President’s bizarre record of cozying up to strongmen and tyrants. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1101122114655010818 …

Today we passed historic legislation to require universal background checks. I cast my vote for #HR8 in honor of 2 of my constituents: Shamoya McKenzie & Michael Nolan, 2 promising young lives cut tragically short by #GunViolence. We honor them & the memories of thousands more. pic.twitter.com/XyUMRJRcDe

After years of obstruction by #GOP leadership, today we passed a major piece of #gunviolence prevention legislation w/#HR8, Bipartisan Background Checks Act. 

It’s nice to finally be able to move the ball forward on gun safety w/o having to take over the House floor in protest. pic.twitter.com/p76AMiEX9X

It’s time. 

#Healthcare is a human right, not a privilege. 

As a founding Member of the House Medicare for All Caucus & a longtime supporter of this measure, I was proud to stand with @RepJayapal and 100 colleagues today as we reintroduced the #MedicareForAll Act. pic.twitter.com/hKIv3GinEp

The Constitution is clear: Congress has the power of the purse. 

If the President’s emergency declaration is allowed to stand, it will undermine the balance of power between the President and Congress and set a dangerous precedent. #FakeEmergency

From the beginning, this national emergency declaration was a farce. 

It was a gross power grab by a desperate President who, even after manufacturing a #FakeEmergency, still couldn’t secure funding for his ridiculous wall. 

I was proud to cosponsor & vote YES on #HJRes46. pic.twitter.com/Gz7UR6f01l

My thanks as always to Jon Stewart, John Feal, and all the remarkable people who come to Washington to fight for the thousands of responders & survivors suffering from 9/11-related illness. We need to permanently #Renew911VCF. You shouldn't have to make this trip every few years. pic.twitter.com/7jhK5z6cbO

.@HouseDemocrats stand united against the #FakeTrumpEmergency, which was a blatant power grab by @POTUS. Tomorrow we'll vote on the joint resolution intro'd by @JoaquinCastrotx that protects our Constitution's separation of powers. Time to terminate this #FakeEmergency. pic.twitter.com/F8RUIkXFB2

The #GOP has made it clear when it comes to women’s reproductive health they will not stop until their radical, neoconservative agenda is met. 

It is incumbent upon us to make sure that never happens. #NoGagRule #TitleX https://twitter.com/PPact/status/1100085681148358656 …
Saw some great friends at today’s aptly titled “Phenomenal Black Women Luncheon” held in #NewRochelle. Congratulations to all the wonderful honorees! pic.twitter.com/hcZ4VGCRhV
It’s always a pleasure to return to my alma mater @LehmanCollege and give greetings at their scholarship fund event! #Bronx pic.twitter.com/fcsW8oed2E

Today I joined five fellow committee chairs to send a clear message to the Attorney General: the Mueller report must be made public. The American people deserve to know the full truth.  https://foreignaffairs.house.gov/2019/2/house-chairs-tell-barr-they-expect-mueller-report-to-be-made-public … pic.twitter.com/PHkWWnXGWi

It was nice to meet with @antonioguterres at the @UN today to discuss, among other things, the threat #ClimateChange poses to our planet. A global commitment is needed to curb carbon emissions, and the US should be leading the way toward a #GreenEconomy and future. pic.twitter.com/vjjikHcgHe

It's time to end the @DeptVetAffairs cruel and outdated dog testing permanently. That's why I joined 60 colleagues to reintroduce the #PUPPERSAct. https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/politics/2019/02/13/fatal-va-dog-medical-experiments-investigation-lara-trump-veterans-affairs/2841951002/ …

No question I’m cosponsoring this joint resolution. @HouseDemocrats will continue to explore every avenue to halt this President’s unconstitutional non-emergency declaration. #FakeTrumpEmergency https://twitter.com/JoaquinCastrotx/status/1096536544872198144 …

Our children have endured enough tragedy.

Our communities have endured enough tragedy.

Our country has endured enough tragedy.

It’s time to re-institute the Assault Weapons Ban. #EnoughIsEnough https://twitter.com/davidcicilline/status/1096437303147446272 …

A gross, rambling speech that is dripping with xenophobia and falsehoods. 

Declaring a national emergency at the border is a farce. It’s the act of a desperate man who can’t deliver on a ludicrous campaign promise. 

We’ll see him in court. https://twitter.com/politicalwire/status/1096442371250757632 …
I'll just leave this here. https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/535441553079431168 …

It is outrageous that a senior Department of Homeland Security official has not complied with requests of the Inspectors General of the Departments of State and Homeland Security. 

@RepCummings @SenatorMenendez and I wrote to @SecNielsen demanding accountability. https://twitter.com/HouseForeign/status/1096076750713511936 …

One year ago today, 17 beautiful lives were taken from this world by #GunViolence. 
 
One year later, @HouseDemocrats move the first major piece of gun control legislation in decades.
 
This is how we must honor the memories of those lost in #Parkland & everywhere else. https://twitter.com/HouseJudiciary/status/1095853420697866245 …

We’ve all seen the horrific images of civilian casualties in the #Yemen war. 

Ongoing military operations are bringing us no closer to a resolution.

The only way out of this mess is for parties to sit down & work toward a political solution. 

#HJRes37 will help do that. https://twitter.com/HouseForeign/status/1095819800515883008 …

Today, the House stood in a moment of silence to remember the 1 year anniversary of the tragic loss at #Parkland. But the House has been silent for too long on #GunViolence, due to the #GOP. @HouseDemocrats are changing that, and it is my hope we will soon vote on #HR8.

The @SenateGOP are so stuck in their anti-science alternate universe, they seriously believe tackling #ClimateChange is a farce that will hurt Democrats politically. 

I welcome them to at some point rejoin us in reality. #GreenNewDeal https://twitter.com/VanityFair/status/1095469665600659467 …
My statement on Rep. Omar's comments pic.twitter.com/TiVshAT81r

Another very sad loss today with the passing of our colleague, Walter Jones. Walter was a gentleman who represented his constituents with great dignity. He wasn’t afraid to reach across the aisle, even if he knew it might cost him politically. My heart goes out to his family. https://twitter.com/MEPFuller/status/1094747075957456897 …

Pat and I send our condolences to @mayorMikeSpano and the entire Spano family on the passing of Leonard Spano. Leonard was a family man & dedicated public servant who has left a lasting legacy in the community. He cared deeply about people & never hesitated to help those in need. https://twitter.com/MayorMikeSpano/status/1094598923967234049 …
Always a pleasure to take part in the annual @JCRCNY Congressional Breakfast. @UJAfedNY pic.twitter.com/3Hbq162mfj
Wonderful night at the #Westchester Jewish Council 43rd Anniversary Gala. Congratulations to all of tonight’s honorees! pic.twitter.com/8TJshCuU8d

This is the difference between a House of Reps. controlled by @HouseGOP and one finally controlled by @HouseDemocrats. #EndGunViolence #ForThePeople https://twitter.com/HouseJudiciary/status/1093554872102932481 …

Pat and I are deeply saddened by the passing of our friend, John Dingell. John was a giant in Congress, whose wit and wisdom could light up a room. Our hearts go out to Debbie and the entire Dingell family. pic.twitter.com/ZU8HPf9QNj

It was a pleasure to welcome my good friends @CarlHeastie, @CPeoplesStokes, & @nily to DC to discuss #NewYork priorities with our NY delegation. 

I’m honored to be co-dean of this extremely strong group of lawmakers, who are working together to deliver for #NewYorkers everyday. pic.twitter.com/sdOHCXBvyF

Standing with @AOC, @SenMarkey and many of my @HouseDemocrats colleagues today as we announce the introduction of the #GreenNewDeal resolution. Time to #ActOnClimate #ForThePeople. pic.twitter.com/ApKBaaipsg

This #SOTU tonight was all over the place. It was filled with baseless rhetoric, self-promotion, factual inaccuracies and delusions of grandeur. It was a Trump speech, to be sure. pic.twitter.com/8w5hITBWE2

Now that @HouseDemocrats are in the majority, tomorrow @EnergyCommerce will hold its first hearing in 6 years on #ClimateChange. My colleagues and I have been screaming about the issue the entire time, while inept #GOP took us backwards (1/8)
Wishing everyone a very happy #LunarNewYear! https://twitter.com/HouseForeign/status/1092766876126666752 …
I’m proud to announce that I am an original cosponsor of the #GreenNewDeal legislation that is being introduced by @AOC and @SenMarkey. Big problems require bold solutions.

This Wednesday, I’ll be chairing the first @HouseForeign hearing of the 116th Congress. We plan take a serious look at our country’s foreign policy in the #Arabian Peninsula & markup #HJRes37 which will direct the removal of US armed forces in #Yemen. https://twitter.com/HouseForeign/status/1091436579531427841 …

Proud to sign this letter and be a member of the @LGBTEqCaucus. #Transgender service members put their lives on the line defending our country. They deserve our support and gratitude. #ProtectTransTroops https://twitter.com/LGBTEqCaucus/status/1092473733909045248 …

A reminder on #WorldCancerDay that up to 50% of cancer cases can be prevented. take these 7 steps to help reduce your risk and visit  http://www.preventcancer.org  to learn more. #CancerPreventionMonth. pic.twitter.com/8ir0FiVP5E

As thoughts turn to the Super Bowl, I realize it’s a little like being in Congress. All the media talk, cheering and hype doesn’t mean anything, it’s what the players get done on the field that counts. I’m in the game, fighting to win for #NY16 every day.
We had a nice time at the #Scarsdale Forum’s Winterfest 2019 event last night. pic.twitter.com/O22LahFaZZ

Gun violence effects all of us, directly or indirectly. We heard some powerful stories of #MomentsThatSurvive at today’s @MomsDemand meeting in #Westchester kicking off #GunViolenceSurvivorsWeek. pic.twitter.com/AlqWXeMrjY
Aren't we a better city, state and country than to subject those incarcerated to Soviet Gulag conditions? Disgraceful. https://twitter.com/anniecorreal/status/1091384384291291136 …

We're holding a Town Hall in conjunction with our partners in government @JeffreyDinowitz @SenatorBiaggi @AndrewCohenNYC on Tuesday, February 19th in #Woodlawn. I hope to see you there! pic.twitter.com/TxSFMkbr4p
I have notified @sunrisemvmt that I agree with the goals of the #GreenNewDeal and I am eager to see bill language in the coming days and weeks.

I was pleased to take part in this morning's #Scarsdale Parent-Teacher Association Council 2019 Legislative Breakfast with my colleagues in government @AmyPaulin, @AndreaSCousins, @ShelleyBMayer, @westchesterBOL Ben Boykin, Regent Judith Johnson, & Mayor Dan Hochvert. #NY16 pic.twitter.com/jaz99JwTar
